invite.emailMessage:
{{senderName}} akakukoka kuti upinde muDott: Global Business Platform!

Mhoro,

Ndaida kukurudzira Dott, platform yekubata bhizinesi yakashandura nzira yandinoshandisa mashandiro angu.

Dott inounza zvose zvaunoda munzvimbo imwe:
â€¢ Sales nekubata vatengi
â€¢ Kutevera nekubata inventory
â€¢ Professional invoicing nemari
â€¢ Financial reporting neanalytics
â€¢ Team collaboration tools
â€¢ AI Business insights neanalytics
â€¢ Geofencing nelocation tracking
â€¢ Real-time business intelligence

Kubva pandatanga kushandisa Dott, ndakadzikisa basa readministrative nemaawa vhiki rega rega ndichiwana real-time insights pamusoro pekushanda kwebhizinesi rangu. Platform iyi inopa enterprise-grade capabilities panguva shoma yemitengo yetraditional software.

Ndinotenda kuti Dott ichakosha zvikuru kumabasa ebhizinesi uye zvaunoda kukura.

Tanga mahara nekusingaperi nhasi: https://dottapps.com

Nerudo,
{{userName}}
